# How to run the metrics

<br> 
 

<br> 

## Input specification


Once you have [installed the data challenge](getstarted_install.md) and [downloaded the data](getstarted_data.md), you can now evaluate your maps. Although, you might want to check first that your sea surface height maps respect a certain format. You can then scroll through the different metrics, checking the "Metrics details" showcasing examples. 
 
 
<br> 
 

<br> 

## Run the metrics 
 

 
<br>  

<br>
